translation: (1) Recite in the name of your Lord who created –
(2) Created man from a clinging substance.
(3) Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
(5) Taught man that which he knew not.
(8) Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
(9) Have you seen the one who forbids
(11) Have you seen if he is upon guidance
(13) Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
(14) Does he not know that Allāh sees?

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
translation: (15) No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock[1952] –
footnotes: [1952]- It may also mean "slap him" or "blacken his face at the forelock."

translation: (17) Then let him call his associates;
(18) We will call the angels of Hell.[1953]
footnotes: [1953]- Those who push the wicked into the Fire.

translation: (19) No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allāh].
